gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.dataset

Class ConvertibleHiveDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.hive.HiveDataset
      • gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.dataset.ConvertibleHiveDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CopyableDatasetBase, IterableCopyableDataset, PrioritizedCopyableDataset, Dataset

    public class ConvertibleHiveDataset
extends HiveDataset

    A HiveDataset that can be converted from one source format to several destination formats. This class holds the ConvertibleHiveDataset.ConversionConfigs required for conversion into each destination format. The ConvertibleHiveDataset.ConversionConfig for a destination format can be accessed by calling getConversionConfigForFormat(String).

    Instantiation

    • The constructor takes in a dataset Config which MUST have a comma separated list of destination formats at key, "destinationFormats"
    • Conversion configuration for a format can be set by using this destination format as prefix.
    • E.g. If "destinationFormats"=flattenedOrc,nestedOrc.
      The destination table name for flattened ORC is set at flattenedOrc.tableName
      And the destination table name for nested ORC is set at nestedOrc.tableName

    See Also:
    ConvertibleHiveDataset.ConversionConfig
